properties.name: application.mongodb.entity-base-packages
properties.description: Default: Main class package name. List of packages to scan for MongoDB entities.

properties.name: application.mongodb.auditing.enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to enable MongoDB Auditing.

properties.name: application.mongodb.auditing.without-transaction
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to do Auditing without Transactions.
